column1: Yeah about 10 years ago I had a horrifying experience. It was 100% their fault but they hit the water barrels and survived. They had no injuries but they almost ran me off the road.	Oh that sounds awful! Sounds like you need to be more careful and check your water marks more often, that's a bad situation to be in.
No I wasn't hit. It turned out they were drunk. I felt guilty but realized it was his fault.	It was your fault for being drunk. That doesn't make you a bad person.

I don't know I was new to driving and hadn't experienced anything like that. I felt like my horn made him swerve into the water barrels.	Well, can you tell me about your experience? I think we swapped places	Yeah. What happened?

Oh my goodness, that's very scary! I hope you are okay now and the drunk driver was punished for his actions?	Well, the incident is over now and no one was seriously injured, but man was that scary. I was turning and about a corner and the car just went another way.
I there, dont know what to do, jst broke up with my girlfirned, we were 8 years together	Oh no that is hard.  I'm so sorry.  I hope you two can be happy again soon!
Yes we decided together with our minds, and know i come home and feel so distant from the world	It will come, that is the truth. Everyone finds someone special and everyone elses fault
I couldn't wait to go to the concert.	What concert was it?

The U2 concert. Tickets were really expensive and I never thought we would be able to go, but somehow we did!!!	That is amazing.  I saw them a couple of years ago and always wished I could have gone.  It is always nice to go to a concert and have a great time.

I'm so sad because i've read an article about a newborn girl who died because her parents didn't believe in medication and doctors	That's so sad to hear! Did the parents change their minds once she was born?
she was born premature at home, she had hard time breathing on her own but instead of taking her to the doctor parents were just praying	That's very fortunate. I'm sure she's in good hands now.

yes! And i do believe in God and prayers but goodness gracious please take your children to the hospital and let God heal them THROUGH doctors	so my friend's baby fell down and scraped his knee yesterday and i was trying so hard to cheer him up	Oh no. Is he okay though?
i was singing nursery songs :)	Did someone sing you a song?
If you happy and you know it :)	my husband lost a job but i'm hoping he can find a full time job soon	I am sorry to hear that! I bet he is looking for something better.
thank you so much!	Sure thing, no problem. Do you have a trick to overcome this phobia, or is it something you can naturally overcome?
he is an armed guard	i just moved to this neighborhood and some dumb criminals shot one of my neighbors and ran into the woods!	oh man i hear you.. scary stuff right there.. i hope no one got hurt
I do! I want to be able to protect my son	That is awesome. protection from what?
i'm so excited because i'm finally going to visit my parents next month! I didn't see them for 3 years	Oh that's awesome! Do you miss them?
I moved to the US and they stayed in my homecountry	That is great. What do you like about your country?
I was very angry when a co worker lied about a car accident to get out of working July 4th. I covered his shift till midnight and he was lying about the accident	Thats awful. Did he apologize?
Yeah he got caught in someones pics on Facebook. Never lie and then go out with people who like to take pictures.	That's awful! Was it a stranger or someone you knew?

Good idea. i don't like social media that much. It can get you in to trouble fast, even when expressing your opinions.	So yeah i drove 2 hours to get to wallmart. with 299 in my wallet as advertised, and the real price of the tv was 399 usd. what a bummer	That is a bummer, do you not like paying for convenience?
Yeah i had my hopes reall high and then i left empty handed, such a terrible feeling!	How did it feel?

Yes, i guess walmart and the rest of false advertisement in the US, the look in my daugther eyes when i came home empty handed	My friend's boyfriend recently made a pass at me. I'm married, and I also am really good friend's with his girlfriend so I felt really bad. I made sure he knew I was loyal and honest to both!	That's great that you took the stand. A friend can be a great influence.

I struggled with it, but my friend was in a really bad spot, with no income and raising her grandchild, he was the financial supporter. So, I didn't tell her, as I knew it would really hurt her in several ways, plus she really loves him!	Oh wow, I'm glad you had the courage to tell her! You sound like a great friend.
my baby is sleeping. it's so peaceful and quiet in this house	That sounds nice
i totally agree with you!	Are you happy or sad about it?
hi, i feel so lonely sometimes because all my friends live in a different country	Why don't you join one of your local clubs?
i was thinking about it! I wanted to join a group for local moms	Did you end up joining?

I have a friend that has a child that is unruly and does bad things. One day at our home, he grabbed a game and sat on it, instantly breaking it! It was expensive and this really irked me, especially because she doesn't discipline him when he does bad things.	That would be really annoying. And really unfair of her to demand you buy it back.

Me either! I have two of my own children, and I would have never let them get away with that kind of behavior when they were his age. I just don't understand those kind of parents@!	Yeah it's really hard to be a parent.  You've got to have a plan for them to keep you grounded.
I'm so scared of bugs! i found one in my hair yesterday and almost died	Gross! I hate bugs too.

Ugh I hate bugs with a passion, they are so creepy	I recently spoke with my ex-girlfriend on the phone. The conversation went pretty well, and it reminded me of my past experiences with her.	It's nice to hear ex's make good conversation, what happened?
Yes, they ended somewhat well, but there were tense moments. I am glad she's doing well, but I miss her.	I understand,  everyone goes through tough times sometimes. But,  they'll get through it
Thank you! That means a lot.	One of the times I remember feeling the most blissed out in life was right after the birth of my first child.	Congrats! That is the best feeling, birth right?

Obviously there are the demands of a new child -- but that feeling of finally meeting someone you waited so long for, and the love surrounding the whole situation. Truly something to remember.	That is great, it is always nice to remember happy times

Have you ever been in a situation when payment of some kind has come through *just* in the nick of time?! Talk about gratitude!	I absolutely have. It is scary. I have delayed many projects due to various deadlines and my personal finances in a row, leaving me little savings and belongings to fend for myself. It was an extremely stressful time.

Absolutely. You go from scared and desperate to grateful and optimistic in one quick moment! It's not a situation I wish to be in again.	That's quite an interesting situation. I guess I've never really been scared or worried about death before. I was more of a scared of the unknown. But I suppose there's no such a thing as too much anxiety. Glad you're happy now.
Im so grateful for my family due to an incident with my friend	I'm sorry to hear about your friend's situation. What happened?
My friend lost her parents and siblings in a fire and their family was very close to mine. So seeing her go through the grief made me realize how thankful I should be	Oh no! Were you able to help?

Yes definitely. Never take anything for granted as you never know when it will be taken away from you	I'm a big believer in listening to your gut. Sometimes I might wonder where my intuition is leading me, but it always seems to be spot on.	thats great

It is a "knowing" -- and a flowing! When something is right, it just feels easier to go with it -- like you're being led, even if you might not fully know to where.	that's so awesome! i love it when something feels right

I couldnt celebrate my 18th birthday as I had exams during the time and I felt terrible for it. But my friends threw a surprise party for me and it was the best!	That sounds like it would be very fun. I am glad you had a fun time.

I was studying in my bedroom for a couple of hours straight with headphones on and then my mom called me to the living room for dinner and when I went out the whole place was decorated and everyone was there	That is awesome that your mom was able to do that!  Was this a surprise?

I feel lonely sometimes cause I live in a house with 5 girls and all of them have boyfriends and sometimes they are all hanging out with their significant others and I feel lonely	I am sorry that you feel that way. Sometimes life can get in the way of making a connection

Sometimes they joke about it and obviously I make it look like its totally fine cause I dont want to give them the impression that I am lonely but it does hurt sometimes	I've felt that way as well. Sometimes it's hard to tell if somebody is being nice to you because they won't back down or if they're being rude!

As silly as it sounds, I was so surprised at how different my two kids were as babies. You're reminded that they're wired with their own personalities from the git-go.	That is a good way of looking at it.

One was pacifier, one was fingers. One wanted to co-sleep, one liked her space. One liked facing *out* in the Baby Bjorn carrier, one liked cocooning in a sling!	How does one like things in a sling? I never understood that
The other day I had a deep craving for Chik-Fil-A.	It is delicious! Are you a chicken or beef person?
Mine too. So I drive there and pull in the parking lot and it's completely empty. I then realized it was Sunday.	Happens a lot. The empty parking lots are a good place to sit and relax.

I visited an orphan once and it was such a surreal moment. It made me realise how thankful I should be for a family	Oh that sounds amazing.  I'm incredibly grateful for my parents for taking the time to help me in my time of need.
Yes it definitely was. I went with intentions to teach the kid a few things but I ended up learning lots more from him	It's good you were able to introduce him to new people.
My oldest and my husband have always had a rough relationship. I've got to believe that as she gets older, it will get better!	I'm sure it will. That's what marriage is about!

That's always good to hear. But in the moment -- argh, my *heart*. How did your mom maneuver the differences between y'all? Did that wear on her?	She did not know that I was ex-girlfriend of theirs. I was more of a "what's your secret?" type guy

But in the meantime -- the unspoken strain is NOT fun. But I'm glad to hear about a happy ending -- thank you for that!	I can still look back with shame at the way I treated a girl in sixth grade. I wasn't as bad as others, but that doesn't make me feel any better.	That's too bad. Hopefully you learned your lesson though.

Well, like a lot of 6th graders I was aware of *not* wanting to be an outcast for any reason. And unfortunately, she was. As an adult of course, my heart squeezes for *all* the kids we were!	Aw, I am glad you have good friends like that to help you through tough times!

Unfortunately, she died. I only found out when Facebook first came out, and her brother and I "friended" one another.	that is really bad of facebook. they should not be allowed to post pictures of famous people
I'm currently working for someone that is *such* a great example of a leader! It makes going into work inspiring every day / every way.	You must really like to work hard to get such a great example.

That's a very kind statement, and certainly what I would strive for. And it's the rarity that *inspires* me. That should be the norm, not the exception! THAT'S what I'd like to inspire in people. How about you?	I like your attitude! You're really inspiring! I think we need more people like you in society.
That is soul-sapping. What do you do to inspire yourself, and not let that kind of behavior drag you down?	I just have to keep doing the best I can and try not to let things get me down.
My friend's baby has grown so much since the last time I had seen her!	How old is she now?
It had been about 8 weeks - I don't get out her way often, even though we live 30 minutes away.	I wish you the best of luck! Maybe she's counting on you to be around even when you aren't.

Yes!  I got to be 'auntie' for a bit and help change her and get her fed and down for a nap while my friend had a chance to toss laundry in the wash.  It was a good day for everyone!	Running my first (and maybe only!) marathon felt like *such* a huge accomplishment!	wow great for you, you must have worked hard for this
Ah, it was the best! Plus it helped that I purposely chose an amazing destination in which to run it -- it was the Venice Marathon!	Sounds awesome!  What did you do?  Was it a marathon?

We were living overseas at the times -- the most impressive part was crossing the Grand Canal over a pontoon of boats to finish the marathon ;-)	Wow. You have some endurance. I bet you could do it in a day.

I recently found out that a person I very much intimately admired did not feel the same way for me. I was pretty surprised.	Oh wow I'm sorry!  That is so tough to deal with.  Sometimes it's just hard to reconcile people and even that can be hard.
She just started treating me differently all of a sudden. And now she is going to be moving away soon.	What is she changing to do?

I'm always appalled when I see bullying in action -- whether it's on a playground or political stage -- not much makes me angrier.	I feel the same way. If someone is being bad to me and it's not my kids, I'll usually just beat them up myself

How do you channel the anger? Obviously, it too easily turns into the same kind of negative emotion I'm upset about -- so that can feel hypocritical!	Honestly,I dont know. But if you can't let it go,Then just make it known that you are frustrated with that specific situation and so you should express your discontent with it.

Are you ever tempted to put anyone's face on the punching bag?! Ha! (Kidding/not kidding!)	One morning my mother came to my house to pick my daughter up for school and told me she saw my daughter's cat on the road and he had been hit. I had to tell my daughter about the loss of her beloved pet.	I bet you were so sad and worried. I hope she knows that loss is never easy.
She was around 11, so she took it very hard. I went ahead and let her stay home from school, as I knew she wouldn't do well that day.	It's good you were patient. She'll be fine
I was soooo excited to take our kids to Disneyland for the first time!	That's awesome! Are you a parent? I bet you are super excited as well.

Same! I was excited because I grew up going there. My grandparents lived in Tucson, and we would spend the summers with them -- the most exciting part being our drive to Disneyland each year!	Oh wow! That sounds like a really great experience. Do you live in Tucson now?

California! Old school ;-) They've kept so much of the original, while adding lots of new attractions.	I recently spoke to my father for the first time in years. It reminded me of my childhood and the distant past.	Now that is a pleasant suprise! How did it make you feel?
We spoke about our recent lives. Apparently he is in the market for a new car.	Oh wow, what kind of car?

Do you like to organize your house.  My mother-in-law recently surprised me recently with some organizing stuff b/c she knows how much I love it!	I love organizing! We have a large family, too. We had to hire a hand-inker once, so we have some hands, and I know how to use them well.
Labels and Bins can be your best friend!  Especially with a new baby.	That is true. I have a newborn and I had to write a check for $1000 with him for his first birthday.
I find it odd -- and annoying -- when people don't respond to or even acknowledge emails.	I know right. I get so busy and ignore everyone that comes my way that I forget what's even in my mailbox

It would be great if there was a way we could all tell the best way to reach someone -- I know some people prefer texts to emails -- but if you're in a work situation, how do you ensure communication?	Yeah, I know the feeling. Some things are better handled in person.
I recently had a big argument with my sister. We both got very upset and angry at each other.	Oh, well I hope it gets resolved
I'm not so sure. We just had a discussion that heated and became an argument with tempers flying.	Where did you discuss heated topics?
I felt most lonely when we first moved overseas, my husband then had to travel out of *that* country for business -- AND I had a new baby!	Aw, that sounds awful. How far did you guys move?
From Santa Fe to Hong Kong -- ultimately a fantastic adventure. And I ended up with a wonderful group of friends. Expats bond quickly!	I have never been but i would love to go.
One of the saddest things to me is when people underestimate what they can do and/or are capable of.	I have a friend like that. Makes me feel pity on them.

That's perfectly natural. You sound like the kind of person, though, that quickly regained their bearings. Disappointments like that usually come with some *good* lessons.	Thank you for the encouraging words. I've always been self-aware and seek out new ways to be useful. I hope that continues

Once my husband asked me not to tell my mom that he was busy that day when she needed his help but I told her anyway.  I really felt bad b/c he got pretty upset with me.	That's good that you were able to keep it respectful. No one should ever be jealous of someone else's efforts.

Yeah thats a good question.  I totally deserved him being mad.  I just felt bad for him b/c he was so busy that day and I didn't want him to have one more thing on his plate I guess	Heh, yeah I have bad days also. But, usually it's not as bad as yours. If he'd had asked, I could've probably told him no. I hope you're able to work it out, too. That can be really tough to figure out.

There was a back neighbor that called my 10 year old son a ugly name one time, simply because he entered her yard slightly when he rode around the corner.!	Oh I get it! It's annoying when people do that.  That's the weirdest thing I've ever heard.

Yes, she lived several house back and she didn't know me, until after she did that! She knew me then, but after I talked to her, she apologized to both of us.	What a nice person! It's nice to have friends like that.

Too often, it's a health scare that makes us value health. It inspires me to try and do something to keep healthy every day.	It sounds like you're taking steps to try and keep healthy everyday. I hope that it works for you.

Happily, I don't have one! It's more seeing family and friends and the situations they're in. Not everything can be helped -- but there are some things we can all do to take care of ourselves, you know?	Good for you. Have you always lived this way?

Every time I look through older photos of my children, I'm taken right back to the time they were that size, and what we were doing! It's a bittersweet feeling, for sure.	I know the feeling.old photos are the best but it really makes you miss the good times
Are your kids adults now?	Ha. No. They are neither. School starts soon.

I have an 18 year old as well -- I don't know about you, but it's hard to consider her an adult sometimes!	I have a hard time having confidence in myself but when I got married and I had my hair and makeup done I felt like I was beautiful!  I had so much confidence in myself that day and it was great!	That's awesome, I agree with you. I hate when I feel like I don't fully fit into a given category.
I really try but it's hard to replicate that day for sure.	I understand, it's hard to be happy all the time, but maybe there's a good reason you're feeling that way.
My husband and I both work for ourselves -- a blessing and a curse at times, since it can be tough to determine a "regular" income.	It really tough for sure!

We found a pretty good balance in that I have a part-time job that I *love* -- and that comes with benefits like insurance. That's a big worry addressed, right there.	Part-time jobs are awesome. I hope you're able to find something that will keep you occupied while you work.

I am sorry, because I absolutely know that concern. I truly hope you find a resolution to that.	I met up with an old flame recently, didn't go how I expected	Well that's disappointing. What exactly happened?
Well, right after she gave me a big hug, she introduced me to her new boyfriend.	Wow, how did that make you feel?

I know right! No warning or anything. He turned out to be a nice guy, but I thought it was a little misleading on her part.	My family and I are going on vacation in a few weeks. We rented a largo beachfront condo and I can't wait!	That sounds wonderful. I am sure it will be a very relaxing and enjoyable vacation.
We are going to be staying at Miramar Beach in Florida, about an  hour Panama City Beach. The view is amazing from our balcony and we are so ready!	that sounds like a nice place to have fun!
I was supposed to go for brunch with my friend Maria the other day. At least that was the plan.	How did it go?
Well, we had initially agreed to meet at 11. Wouldn't you know it, she didn't end up returning my text until 3PM!	Oh man, that's a pain! I bet your really mad right now.
Me and my mom were at this grocery store recently and this guy started following us outside the store and then again inside the store it was so scary!	What did you do?

Well I knew he was following us and so I asked the manager to walk us out to the car and when he did we saw the guy come out again from between the two buildings b/c he was waiting on us.  so scary!	Oh my god! Did the guy get shot?
Did I tell you what happened with Li the other night? Boy do I feel dumb.	Oh no, what happened?

She's 45 minutes late to our anniversary dinner. I don't know what happened to me but I called and left an angry message. Turns out, she had gotten T-boned at an intersection and was talking to the Police Officer when I called!	That's terrible. I would hate to have my anniversary ruined
Ugh! I looked like such a fool at my girlfriend's work party!	what happened?

Well, I ended up having way too much to drink. One of her co-workers had a bottle of Fireball (gross I KNOW) and was making everybody do shots. I didn't want to look foolish, so I had... well too many.	Everyone could have drank that stuff! I am sorry that happened to you.
Did I tell you what happened with the concert I was supposed to go to Saturday?	No, what happened?
Well first of all, it wasn't just any concert - it was Jay-Z and Beyonce! AND IT GOT RAINED OUT!	Whoa that's insane, I would have peed my pants if it was raining
You are never going to guess who was sleeping on the couch when I got home from New York...	Did you tell them?
My friend Benny! The one we all thought died in a monsoon in Thailand!	Oh my! I am so sorry to hear that! Did he/she pass away?

Recently, my husband came home from grocery shopping and had gifts for me for Mother's Day. He had a beautiful diamond ring and other lovely gifts, it was very unexpected!	wow! i could not believe it when my wife got us a cat
I did! I also gave him unexpected gifts and he was super happy. I was very touched by him being so thoughtful!	That is great. What was the gift?
I know I shouldn't count my chicks before they hatch, but I'm feeling pretty good after that interview today!	That's fair, how many chicks have you hometen?
This advertising company! The owner was there - you should have seen his face. My last freelance project was a real winner. Think I got it?	How did you feel after you saw their face?
Did I ever tell you about the time I "got taken hostage"?	No, and I hope never. That was a scary experience for sure.

As a heart attack. It was me and Big C at the World's Largest Pistachio. All of the sudden we hear gunshots, and DiDi's still in the car. We ran in the building, and he comes flying in after us. He never pointed the gun at us, and we ended up running away when he was distracted. It's too crazy - I can't make this up. Just glad to be alive!	That is scary! It sounds like you had a great time though

I went to visit a friend one day and her boyfriend made a pass at me. He actually suddenly kissed me, as I was waiting for my friend to return. I couldn't believe his nerve!	Oh man that is so crazy! I would've freaked out!

I quietly pushed him away, as I didn't want my friend to hear. I was so shocked and upset, since he knew I wouldn't want to make a scene and took advantage.	Well, hopefully he will get over it, he seems like a nice guy.

This past Friday night our refrigerator stopped cooling! We had to go the weekend without it, and of course had to deal with some unpleasant smells and throw away a large amount of food! It wasn't a fun weekend for us!	Oh no!  Did you end up buying a new one?

Yes, and of course we tried to call and have someone come out, but to no avail! You don't realize how much you rely on things like that until they aren't working!	Oh man. I just got a divorce a few years ago and it was rough. Even worse when you're trying to get pregnant right?

I felt pretty bad when I was having girl talk with my friend and we were talking about our partners. Her boyfriend had made a pass at me, but I never told her about it.	Ouch! That is hard! How did you respond?

I felt bad, but she wasn't working and taking care of her grandchild, and her boyfriend was the financial support. I knew it would really be hard on her if she found out, not to mention she really loves him.	She probably understands. It is difficult for parents to have to support their children.

I was at the mall and hug my mom and said to her: Time to go Mommy! and i wasnt her, can you imagine my reaction to it?	Oh wow, that must've been embarrassing, but I think everyone could've reacted to that to some degree, and maybe they did.
Yes, totally but at the moment i felt like the stupidiest person on earth, didn't know were to hide! and my mom was watching	did something happen?

THe good thing about it, was the lady, she was laughing and later told me that it has happened to her childrens to, no worries!	I am looking forward to going on vacation in a few weeks! We have a condo reserved on the beach, with fantastic ocean views. I'm ready!	Oh nice! Where are you going on vacation?
Well, we are staying at Panama City Beach, so we're right there at the Gulf of Mexico.	Oh, that sounds lovely. Is it your first time?

I am definitely a proud parent of our 15 year old -- she was determined to work this summer, and even with us saying no one would hire her until 16 -- she found a job!	I'm so proud! Your kids sound like awesome people.

That, and she's enjoying the independence of having her own money. Remember that? Making money that you truly could use for your *pleasure* (and not just necessities ?! ;-))	Exactly. It's not about what you can do for other people, it's about what you can do for yourself.

Same! I was surprised 15 year olds *can* actually work during the summer. It's just finding an employer who knows those hours get cut WAY back once school starts.	Okay, a silly pet peeve but one nonetheless -- when people just leave their grocery carts willy-nilly in the parking lot. No consideration for others or the people who work at the store!	Seriously! How much do they pay you to park your carts?

Me too. And I will always make sure to at *least* put it in one of those cart corrals, if not walk it back up to the store. Hey -- extra exercise ;-)	I do the same! I always put my extra clothes in a backpack so I don't have to lift it up when I go to the store!
WE CAN SAVE THE WOOOOOOORLD!!!!! (lol indeed....!)	I came home, and my wife showed me a picture in 4d of our future baby, my heart speeded so fast!	Oh that's sweet.  How far along is the baby?
We choose to wait! but the amount of happiness in my body is tremendous! never felt this way before.	Waiting is the worst.  But, it's good you're excited about it.  What's the matter?

Yes, God willing the baby is going to be healthy in every way! can wait to ave the second	I love being in the "flow" -- whether it's in speaking to a group of people or working to help facilitate meetings.	that sounds wonderful.. is there anything like that where you work?

I work with different organizations on strengthening their culture, and I do large-scale visual notetaking (also known as graphic recording). Are you familiar with that at all? (Not unusual NOT to be!)	Oh wow, that sounds like a great job. I think that you must have some supervisory experience, if you're so qualified. I would contact a HR department as I don't know how you'd do that.

That's one of the huge benefits -- learning about many different industries and subjects!	I LOVE when leaders know that it actually *helps* them to be surrounded by strong people -- people they can learn from, that challenge them, and that in some ways could be considered "better".	I totally agree. Leaders who put their foot down for the people are typically better than those who don't.
It's just too many leaders want "yes men" and/or people who feel non-threatening. It's a trap and a quick path to mediocrity, if not failure!	That is unfortunately true.

I'll always remember the day I learned I was pregnant with our first child -- Halloween in Chicago, and we were with friends at the Shedd Aquarium! I've loved baby belugas since ;-)	Awesome! Was there any special occasion or anything like that?
Ha! True that ;-) That's also the year that A Bug's Life came out, and we always thought of our young one as "Dot", the spunky little girl ant in the movie.	Awwwww. I love that movie

This mother's day was amazing! I got so much more than expected and it was all so heartfelt	Aw, that's nice. I always love Mother's Day, but I'm not usually one to brag about myself. It's good that you had a great event and were able to enjoy it with your family.

Yes, definitely! I actually cried a few times because of how much thought went into each gift and what was written in the cards	That sounds very sentimental.  Is there something about cards that you are sentimental about?
THat's too bad. What do you think went wrong?	Couldn't catch a break. I guess I need to find a new job now.
Did they give you any feedback?	Not yet, they told me not to worry about it. I'm expecting a call in a few days.
That is a shame, you need to learn from your mistakes.	Yeah, I am. But mistakes happen and I can't learn from them

So my sister told us a couple weeks ago she was pregnant. Her and her husband are so excited. I hope they have an amazing 9 months and then an amazing time raising the baby.	Congratulations to them!  Is this your first child?
I was very surprised. She didn't tell a single person they were trying for a baby. Just announced it on the 4th of July	announce what?

Yes, they put a picture of their sonogram on the tv and waited for someone to notice it. So exciting	Oh no, what did you do instead? Did you watch Netflix?	I didn't have any Netflix but now I am going to try one out.
Yes, I do. I recently watched the series "Dark." It's the German one.	Oh wow! Did you enjoy it? I've never seen it before!
It's a supernatural mystery type. I won't spoil the twist.	oh thats kinda neat, are you a fan of the show?

It was fantastic, a lot of people have been comparing it to Stranger Things, but its a lot more grime and serious.	I went to a court hearing for unemployment with my former employer, and I felt great about it since I was so prepared with all of the documents and everything I needed to show the court I was in the right for quitting.	That's good. Did they award you a retainer?
Yes, I actually ended up winning it and they gave me 6 months of unemployment pay.	You deserved that 6 months! What a great accomplishment!

Yes I am currently working as a processing assistant at a warehouse. I love it. Much better than my last job	Today traffic was horrible and was so frustrating!	I feel that, even in major cities. I don't like driving in them.
Yes! People were constantly cutting me off,not signalling and slamming on their brakes	Did you ever say anything or do anything about it?
The grudge scared me when I was 10 to which I couldn't navigate my own house.	Oh no! What was it that scared you about?

Thank you, I will. It's just the price you pay to live in Paradise, right! At least now I won't die of thirst.	I went back to a horse ranch where I owned horses over 20 years ago. Good times	I've only been to one but it was a cool one. Do you still have horses?
A paint (Black and white) and a red quarter horse	I love a good tragedy, like that of The Big Lebowski. What do you do to yours?

Horses are hard work but the fun is equal to the work.	The other day I had a flat, but I had my floor jack and 4-way lug wrench in my trunk and was able to get my tire changed and get back on the road within 10 minutes.	That is very lucky timing!

One time, my friends were daring me to jump into a very cold spring from a height of around 40 feet. I was nervous, naturally.	Oh that's pretty tall.  Did you?

I went to the local Farmers Market and bought some produce from a farm stall. I am disabled and the kind farmer, despite being busy with other customers, took the time to take my purchases to my car. What a wonderful, kind man!	That is so wonderful of him! Our country needs more people like you.

Well, I'm in a wheelchair, so can't move too quickly. I just sat looking at them, trying to figure out whether I could reach the broom at the corner of the porch.	Hahaha that's terrible, did you finally manage to get over there?

Well, that would have been an option. The person came right up to my porch and said "Good morning. Can't sleep either?" Yes, it went straight to the outside trash container. I was very surprised that my entire refrigerator didn't smell bad.	Well at least there was trash in there. You can't always smell it all.

Do it! It gives such a wonderful perspective on the world. We've lived in Amsterdam and Zurich as well....and may very well move to Anchorage soon!	Are you going to move there permanently?

She passed two days after Christmas. She was very sick during the whole month of December.	Oh that's awful! How awful for you! I hope she's doing better now!

I will, and thank you so much for the encouragement.	I've been passively job hunting for a few months now, looking for a better job. I haven't had any luck yet and I'm starting to feel like I never will.	Nothing can hurt you, keep trying!

Well I don't have any friends that are in my field or even close to it. I'm trying the best I can and am trying to find other ways to make money too.	Don't be so hard on yourself.  Some people just have to "go" and others have to "not" make any kind of connection.
One of my much younger sister's is starting college in a couple weeks. I am so excited for her.	That is exciting for her too!  What does she major in?

I have recently become vegan and I am very impressed with the food	That's great! Has your diet been tested or is it a lifestyle choice?

I have to get these shots in my head for migraines.	Have you been taking them for a while now?

Me neither, my mom means so much to me.	That's really nice of her!

I saw a dodge viper in the parking lot yesterday. Probably one of the coolest American made cars!	Cool, have you ever driven one?
It was blue with white racing stripes.	That sounds so scary!

My grandfather invited me over and made us an awesome dinner today. I was so hungry.	Did you enjoy it?

Ooh, I haven't tried Cabot. Must look out for it. The cheddar I normally get is from Tillamook. I think it's from Oregon. Where's Cabot from?	Oregon. We never get cheddar here. It's like they have stopped making it here. They just put Mustards on everything now.

I've never done that. Wonder if there's a cheese factory near me. I'm in NC, where the people almost all seem as nice as my kind neighbor!	People are great in small towns. You should go and check it out.
my brother would've turned 34 today. he died 2 years ago and It still hurts so much	That is so tragic, I am so sorry!
yes we were. He moved to the different country but we spoke pretty often	I'm happy for you. There's nothing like family.
I had planned to go to the beach with friends, but it looks like it's going to rain.	time for Plan b
Nah, it said there's be thunder and lightning, so looks like we're stuck inside :(	Where are you that it's not a thing where you live?
I spent last weekend with most of my family, they live out of state and i don't see them often.	i am sorry to hear that.. why did you move?
I did, Yes. Work has been hectic lately so i was really looking forward to unwinding with them.	Aww - that's no fun.  Is it going well so far?
We ate good food, drank wine and went swimming.	That sounds like a great weekend!
It was, kind of hot but not enough to complain about.	Thats what im saying, Im expecting a nice hot day here soon. How hot was it where you are?
I hate how our country is so divided right now	Why is that?
True. I hope we can become less divided in the future and solve things	I am with you on that one!

My father passed away about 2 years ago. It was so very difficult for me and very unexpected. We didn't know he had a life-threatening illness and weren't prepared in any way for his sudden departure from us.	Oh man I'm so sorry to hear that!  Did he get a good end of the stick?

Yes, my family and I are close and we were there for each other. But, my sister had passed away around 6 years before, by committed suicide. The last few years have been very difficult.	sorry to hear that. i have the same issues with my family
I feel like a terrible sibling right now.	Why, what happened to make you feel that
My sister, who lives out of state and i don't see often, was recently in town visiting our dad. I didn't visit with them.	Did you enjoy it?
I am going to a concert very soon.	Exciting, what concert is it?
Imagine Dragon and Grace Vanderwhall, do you know them?	I don't know who either of those people are.

Yes she was.	Our new property management person is remarkably efficient. She emailed me details of a conversation we had yesterday. The others promise the earth and don't deliver!	That is a pleasant surprise. I hope they listen to you
It is. I've been trying to switch apartments for months and this is the first time someone has actually done anything about it.	Have you called to complain?
Absolutely! I move September 1st. No more stompy screechy neighbors at 3 am!!	School for my kids started again this past Thursday.	Did you start them back up right away?
It was good. I am dealing with a mixture of both emotions about them being back in school. I was happy I had all the supplies, clothes, shoes, and other odds and ends in time.	oh nice.. what grade?
I had planned a beach trip about a month before we actually went.	Was there any reason you decided to cancel?
We went to Virginia Beach earlier this week. I was so giddy up that whole month I could barely contain myself.	I love Virginia Beach! My husband and I went twice as well.
My husband, 2 kids and my mother. My kids had never been to the beach.	Oh that must be exciting and a lot of fun.  How old are your kids?
I bought a ticket last week for the lottery, when it was over 100 million dollars.	Wow. So where did that number come from?

I was so excited watching the numbers being drawn, but no I didn't win. But someone did! I'm sure they were happy.	Hey that's not fair! Everyone gets one right sometimes. Don't take it so hard. I'm sure you had a great time.

True, but it would be fun spending that money.	My husband just found out he will start getting a monthly bonus! This was unexpected and great news	That's pretty awesome! I bet you're really proud of him
It sure does. It came as a shock, but a pleasant one.	What's the big surprise?
I just went today to visit my son in his new house.	That's great! How old is he?
It was great! He has saved for so long to buy it.	That's great! Is it for a special occasion?
So tonight we are suppose to go eat out as a family but I cant get a single one of my family members to agree on a place.  So frustrating!	What is frustrating about that?

That's actually not a bad idea.  Wish I had come up with that earlier.  It seems everyone wants something different.	Well, its always good to have original ideas. What kind of food do you like to have?
Im going to have to sue that for next week.  I think this week they can all go make PB&J since they want to be difficult.	Jelly for the little guy
I guess that way the wallet wins every once and awhile too!  lol	I'm so happy that it is Friday!	Same here! What are you doing on Friday?
Somewhat, I work 4 10 hour shifts and have a random off day during the week. Yesterday was my off day. What about you?	5 hour shifts and I'm a teacher.
feels disappointed because my friend fights with me	Hey, that doesn't sound very nice. Are you guys friends?
no i can't because i love him a lot	That's the same reason I can't have kids, no matter how much I want to love him.
I have Lupus and it is getting worse.  I asked my doctor for a chance to try a new diet I found that is suppose to help me with it.	Oh no, that's terrible. Have you already decided on a diet?

yes, but they are quite powerful which I am trying to avoid.  I am already on one and I am hoping that through this diet I can get off b/c the next steps won't be fun	I'm sorry to hear that you're having trouble with one or two.  Do you have a solution to the problem?

Some time ago, there was a terrible tornado that came through my city. It destroyed many homes, a school and some people died. I was so fearful and petrified it would come by our home and destroy it, or harm my familY!	Wow. I can't even imagine. Are you ok?
No, they are so awful! They can destroy so much.	I used to have one of those but they got expensive.
My husband took me to get a new wedding band recently	That's nice. Did you like it?
I didn't know ahead of time! Mine had broken a bit and he saved up to get me a new one.	Well that's very thoughtful of him. Did he offer to buy you a new one?
I love the holidays. Driving around looking at decoration is my favorite.	I'm the same way! I'm an IT guy so I love the holidays too. What do you do for a living?
Christmas. It makes me miss my moms decor.	Oh no. Maybe you can take it up with her.
I have a wonderful sister-in-law.  who is always there for me when I need her	that's a good relationship. I hope everything works out!
I feel so lucky to have her as a sister-in-law and a friend.  She is always there to offer a supporting ear and encouraging word.	You are very lucky. Sounds like you have a great family!

A few weeks ago, we finally got a chance to get back to the beach for our vacation. But, it rained several days, so we didn't get to spend as much time at the beach as we wanted, which sucked. We were really looking forward to it.	That would be really disappointing. Would you be able to go back at all?

Oh, no, it was about a 7 hour drive! My daughter was quite young when we went and didn't remember the first trip and she's a teenager now. So, a long time since we first went.	Oh wow that is not fun! I bet you feel terrible! Hopefully she feels better about it now.
My husband just a promotion at work he was really wanting	He must be so happy.
I know..ha ha!  He worked so hard for this and I am so proud of him.	Hey good for you!  Don't be too hard on yourself.  You seem really happy about it!

We took a vacation recently and had to leave my daughter's teenage boyfriend a key to our house so he could take care of the pets. He's a good young man, so we didn't feel uncomfortable anything would come up missing.	That's good. You are trusting with your daughter but I'm sure it was for the best

We didn't have much choice, as we had an outdoor dog and indoor cat, so if we didn't, we'd come back to not having pets. But, I wouldn't just let anybody, that's for sure!	Its always important to have choice
My mother-in-law once told a secret of mine that she promised she would never tell	Was the same for you?
I know it really hurt me and I had to work on trusting her again with other things	It's so bad to have to trust somebody with your life. How long has it been since you've seen her?
One night when my children and I came home, I saw a shadow inside! I was so fearful and afraid!	oh my god, it looks like a ghost or maybe a robber?

It was so scary! Luckily, it was actually my shadow! The light made my shadow show up, but it first appeared to be an intruder!	Oh my goodness, that's terrifying, I bet you were terrified! Were you able to squash the issue?
Last weekend, my family and I enjoyed a nice meal together, and then watched a movie. It was a relaxing time at home, just enjoying each other's company.	That sounds great! What movie did you watch?
Yes, it was drama free and a relaxing time.	That is awesome!  What happened?
My dog, riley had to be put to sleep due to congestive heart failure	That is so terrible. I am sorry.

It was one of the hardest things I had to go through but I know that Riley is not suffering anymore so that helps	Good for you! I struggled with my same thing. But I know life isn't exactly rosesicle.

I didn't tell my friend when her boyfriend hit on me. She was in a bad spot and needed him for financial support, and that's why I didn't tell her. But, I still felt so bad about it.	Sometimes we don't fully know the situation and we need to interpret what he said to mean. Either way it was a big deal and I am sure you will be great again in the future.

Well, she had custody of her handicapped grandchild and no job, plus she was very much in love with him. I thought it would just make things worse for her.	Oh no, I am so sorry!  That really sounds like a tough situation.
I am trying a new diet to treat my Lupus.	Oh no! Have you heard about Wheatgrass? I hear it's supposed to help a lot.
I am nervous b/c so much rides on if this works or not.  If it doesn't than I have to take some really powerful meds that i would rather not take	Oh no! I hope everything goes well for you!

There's a coworker that will not follow instructions on work assignments, so she makes many mistakes. It's so frustrating and aggravating, since it causes others more work.	That is frustrating for everyone. I have found that if you can't let her go, you have to let her know it.
Exactly! You try nicely to explain it to her over and over, but she won't listen. Such a nuisance!	It drives me nuts too hahah

My mother picked my daughter up for school to take in the morning, and found her cat dead. It was so hard for my daughter and made us all very upset.	Oh my, that is horrible. Did she say how she found out?
Yes, she was only about 9, and loved her cat so much. It broke my heart to see her so upset!	oh no! why did it break your heart?
I decided to play the lottery the other day and won.	Thats awesome, good for you!
Not normally, so I was quite surprised.	What happened?
$1000. It was enough to help me catch up on my bills. So I was happy.	That is a lot of money!  I hope you have been able to do that.  Are you going to save any of it?
Thank you, that was the first time I have ever won anything like that. I almost passed out.	I have a bad experience at the supermarket the other day.	Oh no! What happened?!
Someone backed into my new car.	Are you mad?

Yes, they ran! I was so mad when I got to the car and saw it.	Many years ago, we were at a friend's house and one of her friend's was there and she was drunk. My husband was very insistent on helping her, but I felt he was being a bit to 'helpful'. It made me a bit angry!	Ah, that's a tough situation. I can understand why you'd want to help, but still.

Well, she was attractive and at the time, I thought he was thinking that too. But, I know now he was just trying to help her get to a safe place, since she was falling down. But, it was hard to see it at that time lol	Oh no, that's too bad! Was she okay?
I had a bad morning when I went to check my mail.	Oh no, what happened?
Especially when you find your mailbox laying in about 10 pieces after someone knocked it down last night.	Wow! Did you confront them?
Not really. I live in town, but it's a small town.	Small towns are great and all but I get bored easily.
That's a good idea. I might do that. We don't have a camera because we don't normally have any troubles.	Maybe you can put a pole up in your back yard and see who comes to take it?
My aunt came to visit today, we went out for mexican food!	What a nice aunt! What did you guys eat?
Yes, kind of upset she was only able to stay in town for a few hours, she is on a road trip!	Road trips are great! Maybe you can go next year!
I have a big exam for college coming up, I have been studying day and night.	I hope you do well in spite of having a hard time! What class is it for?
It is for my molecular biology class, I feel pretty good that I am going to Ace it.	That's awesome. I hope you do!
I went and saw a hockey game today, It was really exciting.	I love hockey! Was it your favorite team?
No, I use to play growing up. I haven't been to a game since graduating highschool.	I understand, being away from the people you love can be a different experience! What sports do you play?
I was on a run today, and saw a loose dog but couldn't catch it before it ran off!	Oh no. Hopefully the dog wasn't hurt too bad.

Maybe if you live in Central Texas...haha! But I was so worried about that small dog getting hit!	Yeah that's a good point! Even in small towns there are lots of crazy people who have no idea what a dog even is.
I got some bad news today, my dad passed away.	Oh no! I'm so sorry to hear that, I lost my mom last year and it can be very hard. Were you close?
Thank you, I am a mess. It is still hasn't hit me that he passed away.	I'm so sorry. That is so hard.
Its so quiet in my house, my husband is out of town for work.	That's usually how it goes - unless your husband is sick
True, I'm trying but keep hearing creepy noises. Guess I need to turn the TV up louder haha	Maybe turn on some surround sound too.
I got some great news today! My husband got a better paying job offer!	Oh that must be awesome!
Not sure yet, but itll help us life more comforatbly! We move to his hometown in November when he gets out of Army!	That's a big change! You sound excited about it
My daughter is in highschool but took a college course this summer and got an A!	You must be proud.  What is she going to school for?
That is very good. You should be proud of her.	I ate way too many sweets today!	oh no! sweets are my favorite
Thanks! Being on a diet is hard, espically with family in town!	Yes! Do you try to eat healthy? And exercise.
I was running today and felt like this car was following me..	What kind of car was it?
Yes it was, I think I need to start carrying pepper spray or something	why would you carry pepper spray
Im watching the show The Bold Type, my favourtie characters dad died :(	I've never heard of that show but it sounds like a good one.  I'll have to check it out!
Yes, it's a great girly drama! Reminds me of Sex in the City but Modern.	oh cool!  I loved that show
It's been a great night! I'm just relaxing with a cold drink and my favourite show!	Sounds like a nice night.  What show is it?
Yes defenitly, It dosen't get better then this! My daughter has been fast asleep since 8pm.	Are you sure she isn't just tired from work?
My family is moving from Texas to Arkansas in a few months, Im worried for the change.	It will be fine. Everyone makes the difficult decisions they must. Do you have any family in Texas?
My husband is getting out of the Army and moving back to his hometown where he has a few job offers! Big changes coming..	Ah that is a big change! Has it been for a while now?
I recently moved into a new home.	That must be exciting!
Yes, there are a lot of kids that our daughter can play with.	What kind of age is she and is she creative?
We had been saving for 4 years to buy a bigger house. We had outgrown our other home.	I had a doctors appointment today.	and how did it go?
I was so mad because I had to wait a hour after my appointment time before they called me back.	Oh no!  I'm so sorry.  Did they finally call you back?

I agree! Everyone was so annoyed because we were all waiting forever.	I had just moved in to my new apartment, and every night this skinny little tabby came begging for food at my door.	Oh, how cute! That's definitely something you'd want to feed a tabby. Did you end up giving the tabby food?
At first I tried to resist, but I ended up adopting him!	That's awesome! What kind of dog is he?
I received a wrong number call last night at 2 in the morning.	did you confront them
Yes! It was so aggravating. They would not believe me when I kept telling them it was the wrong number.	That would annoy me too. You think they would be more helpful giving you the correct answer?

She did twice before she finally believe me that there was no Bret there.	I recently found out that I am having baby number 4.	Great, exciting and scary all at the same time. How far along is your baby?

Wow! That is great. We were thrilled because we didn't know if we were going to have anymore and nature just decided for us.	That is a great way to think about it! We don't get enough natural gifts in our life.
Yes they are. They make life worth living.	Halloween is quite a big holiday where I live. People get really in to their costumes!	so you really like dressing up with your family and friends?

It's peoples creativity that makes it so entertaining. Last year I went as a plague doctor, and everyone agreed it was terrifying!	You're absolutely right.Creativity is the basis for any good creative work!
Last year we lost our home of 20 years to a house fire.	oh no! that's awful. is it being replaced?
Yes, thankfully everybody was safe. Nobody was even home when it happened.	Sounds like a scary situation! Did everything turn out okay?

No, we just bought another house closer to town. It was sad losing everything that we had.	When me and my friend got lost in the desert, I thought we were done for.	Oh my god. Was it a major or minor desert?
Only a couple of hours. We flagged down an old Chevy truck and the man driving got us sorted out.	Oh cool! What luck!
I went tonight to meet my daughters teacher.	What grade is she in?
Yes, I think she will be a great teacher. She showed us her plan for the year and I think it was great.	Awesome. That's a great way to start the year. What grade is she in?
Thanks so much. I completely agree.	I just finished watching the Saw movie.	I've never seen it, but I love to hear people talk about it!
I hated it! I didn't want to watch it but my husband did. The gore is just too much!	I can see how you would be turned off by it.  What did you end up doing?
Yep! I feel kind of sick to my stomach now from watching it.	I recently went down memory lane was looked at all my high school yearbooks.	That must have brought back a lot of old memories.
Well.... maybe not as awesome. lol But I do try to keep in shape. It was good seeing all my old friends.	Everyone needs some old friends. It's good to have people you can keep in contact.
I do a lot of them but some have moved away and we just lost touch.	I feel sorry for you. Do you talk often?
That's a good idea!	What is a good idea?
I had this guy flag me down today after leaving the store.	Sometimes pulling people off the street is worth doing for
I was scared at first and then he hollered and pointed to the top of my car and I had left my purse on it. Boy, did my face get red.	That's horrible! Hopefully he didn't hit you!
My daughter just bought her first car on her own.	That is wonderful. You must be very proud. What kind of car?
It's a 2008 Mustang. She worked the last two summers to buy it.	That's a sweet story. Did she get a good deal on it?
She is super excited to start school now and show it off.	I'm leaving tomorrow to go on vacation!	That sounds exciting! Where to?
We are going to Daytona and Orlando for 10 days.	I am so jealous of you!
I sure hope so! We've been planning this trip for a year.	Where are you going? Are you excited?

My husband and I have a fun weekend trip planned soon. We are going to go to the casino for the weekend, just the two of us. We are really looking forward to it.	That sounds like so much fun! I want to be able to go to one of those in my life.
Yes, it's been awhile since we had just some time for us. Plus, we love Blackjack!	I think I would enjoy a visit from you guys sometime as well
I have a very good friend and her live-in boyfriend of 5 years hit on me! I'm married, and he didn't care. He sickens me!	That is just rude of him, I am sorry.
Yes, I was really surprised and I find it terrible behavior.	What happened?
We went on a vacation a few weeks ago, and it really made me think back to our last vacation. It was with my father, the last one before he passed away.	It is so nice to have those memories.

I did, but of course, wished I had more time. He passed away unexpectedly, so I was going over that vacation in my mind too. I miss him.	oh im sorry to hear that. i hope he passed away soon so you can spend more time with him
I was pleasantly shocked the other day when I won on a lottery ticket! I hardly ever win and I won $200!	Wow. Congrats. How much did you pay for the ticket?
I just tucked it back for a rainy day. But, I may splurge with it this weekend, since it was unexpected.	I love rainy days!  Did you go all out or did you pull back into the house a bit?
My husband sure did surprise me with his handiness and hard work around the house last week. He was able to accomplish so much work in a few days!	that is awesome i bet you were very happy
Ok	I was the first person to receive a pretigious award at my college after years of the award being on offer.	Oh wow, you must be proud. What was the award for?
At the department office back at the school.	Did you do something embarrassing or funny?
One of my coworkers really ticked me off one day. She decided she would delegate some work to me by slamming on my desk and demanding I do it. She had some nerve!	What did you do?
Yes, she doesn't have the right to do that. I have been that many years longer than her, and it was her work! I let her know it too.	She sounds like a terrible person.

One year my cousin wasn't going to get her young son anything for Christmas. It broke my heart so my husband and I bought his Santa gifts that year.	That was so thoughtful! Your husband sounds like a great guy.
The little guy deserved a Christmas and we really loved him.	Sounds like you had a really good childhood.
When I went to the fair last year, I tripped on a large cord they had going across the walkway. It was a long, running fall! I wanted to hide!	i would have been so embarrassed, did anyone see?
Scuffed knees, but mainly my pride. I was also in front an attractive guy I knew so it was even worse.	Was the guy good looking or ugly?

My husband and I are at a point in our lives, we are able to save, afford all that we need and save for retirement. I'm so appreciate we can, as I know many aren't able to do that.	You must have a lot of faith in your husband!
Yes, we have been working hard, as well as not always getting all the extras we would like at times. But, it's worth having some financial freedom!	Yea it sure is. You sound very ambitious.
One day at work while I was pregnant, I fell! Luckily, the baby and I weren't hurt, but I wanted to waddle away so fast!	Oh no! How many kids do you have now?
Yes, it really was quite so!	What was quite so?
There are times I feel a bit alone and down. My husband has to travel out of town for work quite often.	I know that feeling, I'm sorry to hear that.
Well, yes, of course. But, that isn't quite the same, is it.	haha what's the difference?

My children recently started school again and it made me feel a bit apprehensive. They are growing up so quick, and I know it won't be long before they sadly move out of the house :(	It's always worrying when your kids grow up and leave you.  But I'm sure with enough schooling they'll be able to fend for themselves.
For sure! But, it flies by before you know it. I get my nerves on edge when I think about them all moved out of the house.	OH that sounds horrible! How many people are in the house?
Despite working until a few hours before, I scored highly on the ACT the first time I took it back in high school years ago.	Good for you man. ACT is a great test to have.
Thanks. I thought I'd do poorly because I was tired.	That happens sometimes! But I'm sure you did great anyway!
Not that long ago, my husband planned a secret trip for us! I didn't have a clue he was doing it and was pleasantly shocked. It was so much fun!	That is so fun!  Did you have fun?
We just took a weekend trip to Tunica, MS. We stayed at a really nice casino hotel and just played some Blackjack, enjoyed good food and each other's company!	I've never been to Tunica, have you?
I lied to my mother one day about where I was going. It made me feel pretty bad and have a bad conscience.	thats unfortunate, dont feel bad its happened to everyone
She didn't want me going with that friend, but I wanted to go, so I lied to her. I was much younger then.	Was the friend a female?
I won a free trip to Florida. It's not the best vacation, but I'll take it for free.	Wow! That is awesome!  In which area are you going?

I've been to Florida many times before so it wears on you.	Florida is a pretty big state. I've been to all of theses places except the one time I went to the one pizza shop and it was terrible. What's the deal with that?
I won a lottery for a small amount of money.	well congrats! how much was it?
No, I wish. It was only a few hundred dollars.	Oh well, at least you got a good deal.
A good friend of mine moved away recently and we lost contact. I really wish we would still speak.	That really sucks. Did you make any new friends?
That's a good idea. Maybe I'll try that soon.	What are you planning on doing with it?
Someone was speeding on the road and I got into an accident with them. My car was totalled because of their carelessness.	I'm sorry to hear that.
Yes, but not as much as the car was worth and it wasn't an enjoyable situation.	Oh no. What happened?
I let a friend watch my dog for a week while I was out of town. I would've been devastated if anything happened to him.	Oh my god. What happened?

I hope so. I've only had my dog for a short time and this is my first time away from him.	Oh wow I can relate, it's really tough to let go of them. Take time to process everything, but I'm sure you will be fine!
I have been feeling great about life recently. My relationships have been going very well	thats awesome to hear, i hope they continue
I am not, but I have a person I am very fond of. Are you?	Are you? I'm a romantic so I can totally relate. Do you feel the same way?
I got a surprise gift in the mail yesterday.	Oh, what did you get?
A gorgeous vase. It's so pretty. I have no idea who sent it.	Awh, that's so sweet. Where is the vase from?
Yes, I love flowers. I can't wait to fill it up.	My sister broke my vase. I was pretty enraged!	Oh no!  What happened?
I scolded her but then told her it was okay, but it's not the biggest deal!	What did she do?

I'm am upset today because my daughter who lives really far away called and said her baby was admitted to the hospital.	OH no! I hate when parents can't keep their kids close to them. Is everything ok?
He was premature so he's been having some breathing issues. I hate not being there.	Oh wow, I am sorry to hear that. I am sure everything will work out fine though!
I'm so taken by the talents of contestants on the show Face Off -- have you ever seen it?	I haven't but I have heard of it. I used to watch it as a kid.
Their abilities to both imagine and create their characters is incredible!	What abilities do you speak of?
A lot people know Toys-R-Us has completely shut down not long ago.	Oh no, when did this happen?
Yeah, a lot of my friends and I got to thinking of all our memories there. Really makes you think back.	All that stuff about the past really creeps me out. Makes me feel weird.
I feel so bad, I forgot my sisters birthday...	Oh no! I hope everything is okay!

Yes I plan on it, its just been stressful time at home with a toddler, it slipped my mind	Oh, I bet. I have felt that way when my toddler was born too (2002). Time for dramatic license plate adjustments!
I love my husband so much I could never cheat on him.	That's awesome that you love your husband like that! It must make you feel good to be a part of the right set of people!
Yea, I wouldnt want to hurt him, i cant understand anyone who does.	Do you have any animals?
It can be really tough when your husband and teenagers have electronics.	I couldn't imagine! How does that make you feel?
I do for family time but sometimes I can sit in a full room and still feel no one is there	Do you have a significant other?
Tomorrow is my husbands Birthday!	Well happy belated birthday to both of you!
Yes, we are going out for a nice dinner. We haven't been on a date in months!	That sounds great!  Are you excited?
I love the holidays, that make think back to being a kid.	I do too! What's your favorite part about the holiday?
Yea, that would really be great. Or maybe we'd get bored.	I'd be happy either way, having no "days" off would be great.
There is a big storm going on in my town right now!	I hate big storms, they are scary
I don't, it makes me nervous with the strong winds and rain!	That bad huh.
My favorite game has an expansion on Monday, I can't wait.	What game is it?
World of Warcraft, It's been my favorite for years.	I have never heard of that, tell me more.
I just got a promotion at my job!	Congrats! What will your new position be?
