I think my electrolytes were off, I actually fainted on the plane and they made a whole to-do about it.	My university is posting live stream of students moving in and I was reminiscing about when I studied abroad in college	What university is it at?
I studied in Venice Italy and travelled all over Europe	That sounds very interesting. What did you learn there?

I won a storage shed auction last Monday and found my grandmother's old glass eye in a steamer trunk inside of the shed. Really reminded me of her and how much I miss her.	I'm sure it was a great glass eye. Did you keep it in a safe place?

Rita May. She used to mess with me by popping it out and showing me her empty eye socket just to get a laugh while she got drunk off of bourbon. Those were such good times.	Oh that sounds so funny. What did you do?
I'm pretty excited for the upcoming Halloween season.	Me too. I love halloween.

Well In September, Universal Studios starts their Halloween Horror Nights events, after dark!  It's so much fun I can't wait to grab tickets.	Oh how exciting. Sounds like a fun time. Halloween is my favorite holiday.
I was loyal to the same company for 10 years.	That's good. I assume they're no longer your loyalty?
Nice. I wasn't rewarded though. They laid me off.	Lol.. what? Everything was fine when you got your paycheck?
I told a lie to my mother.	Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. What was the lie?
I was about school. And I eventually confessed.	Were you in trouble?
I got a job after a long period of unemployment.	That is great!  It is good to be rewarded for hard work!
Yes. I was very happy to be gainfully employed.	Did you enjoy your job?
I was in a car accident. Both cars were totaled.	Oh no! That's tragic, did they have full coverage?
They were running from the police. It was nerve rattling.	Why were they running from the police?
So my family surprised me this year with a party for my birthday.	That's so awesome. You are very fortunate
They got me the new shoes I've been wanting. I was so elated and had such a good time!	Wow! That's awesome! What kind of shoes?
I had a job interview. The guy really knew his stuff.	Nice, were you nervous going in?
Yes, really smart and easy to talk to.	Are you best friends with a partner
I don't know yet.	Our power went off the other night. We were without it until morning!	That is the worst. without the power for a couple days?
Someone crashed into the power line I think. It was so quiet and felt pretty spooky.	Oh no! Are you ok?
I bought a raffle ticket for a charity where I have a 1/500 chance of winning a car	Oh! That's exciting!  I always win things!  What is the prize?
Yes.  They were $100 but they only sell 500 tickets.  And the money raised goes to breast cancer research	I'm so sorry to hear that. How is the research going?
jumpfortherose.com	Someone helped me move.	oh thats good
Yes, and I paid them with beer. I was thankful because I had a toe injury.	Did it hurt very bad?
I bought a powerball ticket last week but did not win	Sorry to hear that. Will you be able to buy one more time?
I would have bought a new car and a house perhaps.  But I lost :-(	Oh no what happened?
Yes.  Maybe next time I will win!	I spent Saturday night playing Lord of the Rings Online.	that is amazing, it has probably been one of the best games ever made!
It is good, but I sometimes wonder if I'm trading real life for a fantasy world.	I do too, but it's not that hard to change the outcome.
I am so mad that our politicians won't do something to stop Russian hacking	I agree. That is so scary.
Yes.  The Republicans just don't seem to care about our country any more and I am so mad that Putin owns Trump	I agree, they are a disgrace and I am sick of it.
My goldfish died.	Oh no, I am so sorry. How long had you had her?
For 4 years. I'm bummed.	4 years? why is that
Not yet.	I had an unprofessional job interview.	oh. was it a high paying one?
The receptionist ignored me, and my interviewer was not prepared.	Oh no! That's terrible. Were you able to follow up about what happened?
My computer crashed while I was working on a project.	oh man! that must've been super annoying! are you alright?
I did. I hadn't saved, and I forgot to set up autosave. It was very frustrating.	Did it make you angry?
My favorite team blew a big lead in the playoffs. It was like drinking sour milk.	It's so hard for sports fans to have expectations like that, I'm sorry.
I hate when teams choke. It makes me sick.	i do too
I woke up this morning and my eye is itchy and my right eyelid is drooping	Did you go to the doctor?
yeah I am going to see what it seems like tomorrow - not sure if something got in it that scratched it or what	What something? Scratched? scratched out?
Yeah I will if it does not get better quickly	Me and my family went to see a magic show for the first time today.	Ooo, was it a good one? My family loves watching scary movies.
I didn't catch his name, but he pulled a rabbit out of his hat. Classic trick, but I'll never forget it!	What movie was it?
I have a job interview tomorrow. I'm looking forward to it.	Cool. What kind of job?
Yes. It seems like a great opportunity.	What opportunity do you see?
I scored well on an aptitude test.	That is always good.  What was it on?
I had a few drinks. I felt good.	Drinking isn't my forte but I'm glad you're feeling better. What kinda drink did you have?
So today my mother brought over a whole week of meals to help me out.	That was nice of her.
Yes, she's always helping me out! I am so thankful for her she's an amazing mother.	You are so lucky to have someone like that in your life. You are very lucky.
So I moved away from my parents not too long ago. It's been a big change.	That can be quite a change, adjusting well?
Out of state. I'm by myself now, so it's pretty quiet! I miss them a lot.	I hate being by myself.

My oldest child needed braces but her health insurance wouldn't cover the expense. It was close to 4000 dollars and we did not have that kind of money at the time.	Are you able to donate the money to the kids need homes?
Yes they do. My aunt paid half of the cost for us and didn't has for any of it back because she knew we needed the help.	That's very kind of her!
I was sitting on the couch after a long day taking care of work and all the mommy stuff the other day.	That sounds relaxing. What did you guys do?
It was! My family was happy and together. Chatting and watching tv. Everything just felt right.	That's great. I feel like I have a new family member
My husband used to work out of town in a different state Sunday through Thursday.	What does he do now?

Yeah, he does work hard. Even thought my children were with me and we kept our usual routines, I was miserable when he was gone. I would cry after he left every Sunday. Luckily now, he has a job where he is home everyday by supper time.	That's great that he's working so hard! What type of work does he do?

We really are, he brings out the best in me.	I didn't have a car to get to and from work, so my parents actually let me just keep theirs for a bit!	That was so nice of them!  I wish I had parents like that!
Yeah it was so giving of them to leave it to me for so long and helped me a ton!	Why didn't you leave it longer?
While driving today I went past my grandma's old house. She passed last year.	Oh, how is she holding up?
Oh for sure. Good feelings, but I also miss her so much.	What happened to her?
I went outside to get my paper this morning. Someone had ran over my mailbox!	oh no that is horrible
No, it's completely demolished! I'm feeling pretty annoyed.	That's no good, are you going to complain to the landlord?
My sister is a journalist and she got her first big story published in the paper today!	That's awesome. Which one?
It is! It's a really big deal and I couldn't be happier for her.	What a big deal! What will you do if you don't mind me asking?
So my partner gave me the biggest surprise this week.	Congratulations! How did he give you the biggest surprise?
He got us a trip to Hawaii! I couldn't believe it, I am so elated!	Oh, wow. How much does the trip cost?
I finally went and adopted a cat last month and go way more than I expected!	Yay! I love cats. Congrats! What kind?
Well it was only supposed to be her, but we found out she was pregnant! She popped out a whole litter of adorable.	I have had a litter of puppies.. Not always a happy thing!
I had to leave town last week and that meant leaving my pets who are my babies. I needed someone who could take care of them properly.	That really sucks. How many pets do you have?
It is very hard! The only one who I'd let do it was my sister and she did an amazing job.	I am sure she feels the same as you do. I am sure she feels the same about you. What happened?
So I finally decided to take my dog for his first dog park visit.	That sounds exciting! What do you think will happen?
It's hard to tell! He refused to leave my side the entire time and just watched the other dogs play.	That's sad, is there anyone else that can take him?
Im embarrassed to admit I forgot to pick up my brother from worth the other day after agreeing to	oh, how long did it take?
Ha ha, he was a little miffed. He got over it though when I stopped and got him ice cream on the way back though! I felt like such a jerk.	haha I'm sure he'll forgive you! It's a tough situation!
I finally took the plunge and decided to go back to school this year.	That's awesome. Going back to school can be both exciting and scary.
I start next week! I was super hesitant at first, but I'm so glad I'm making myself do it.	Good for you.You will be better then you think.
I was going through some stuff and found a box of jewelry my grandparents had gifted me through the years.	Oh that's lovely! What did you find?
Yeah, it really made me think of them and old times.	Do you have any memorable times with them or were they mostly happy memories?
I recently had a shop fix my car. They worked so fast!	That's good. Sometimes when shop fixes are good they don't take long.
I was able to go home, but I realize now that I didn't even have to	Wow! what a wonderful feeling
My husband is going through the process of quitting smoking on top of dealing with drama from his parents. He is having a hard time.	I'm sorry to hear. How do you cope with the drama?
They aren't being supportive at all, but that's not surprising, that don't support him very well in anything. I just wish I could make it better for him, but I can't	Why don't they be supportive?
I have some great friends. One of them drove me to the airport tomorrow	That is really nice! What state are you in?
Yes I am, they are great	Who are you talking about?
We just found out the person working in our accounting department has been stealing money from our company for years.	Oh no, that's terrible. I hope they get fired.
Yes, it just makes me sick to my stomach. You think you know someone but the whole time they are stealing you blind. I don't get some people	Have you ever thought about working on social services?
I miss high school. My girlfriend was the best	I felt the same way.  Are you guys together now?
That's great. College was also fun	I didn't have to go to college!
I recently bid farewell to a good friend. I miss her	Aw, I'm sorry. How long had you been friends?
Thank you, that means a lot. I will see her again	You bet. Hopefully this is a relationship she'll be happy with too.
I lost my car keys. I'm such a fool!	I'm sorry to hear that! Are you going to replace them asap?
That's pretty funny, and makes me feel better. This is the first time I've lost my keys so I hope to keep it that way!	You got this bro! Keep it up!
I came home the other day and my roommate had a friend over. I've only seen him with a friend over once in my 3.5 years of living here.	I bet you had a good time?  Did you guys have some good times?
Yeah I sure was, he seems to like this one much better than the last one he had over. He couldn't wait for that first guy to leave.	That is how it is though, hope it works out for you.

One of my co-worker came and asked me a lot of really weird questions about my supervisor. It seemed suspicious so I pretty much told her I didn't know any of the answers to her questions. I don't think she likes my supervisor.	Is the supervisor female?
Yeah I figured it was, so I just played dumb and let my supervisor know. My supervisor has always been good to me.	Thats great.  What is he or she like?
Man there aren't many people I would give my last couple hundred dollars to, with one notable exception.	Why is that?
My buddy Stefan. He used it to print hundreds of bootleg concert posters. We sold them and netted $2000 a piece!	Wow! So he made a ton of money off of it. That's crazy!
I finished first in a race. I feel like gold	Nice! What kind of race?
Yes! It was my first victory. All my hard work is paying off	Congratulations! What game did you play?

Some of my friends told me that they had a big surprise for me. They know I hate surprises, but I complied and let the blindfold me and drive me out to the location.	Oh wow, that must of been a nice surprise!
They had decided to pool their money together and get me one big present together. It was a flying lesson at the local airport.	What was the present?
I found an old photo album at my grandma's house that had pictures of me when I was a kid	thats so sweet i love looking through old photo albums.
Yeah, it did. I really miss the 90s. Everything seemed a lot simpler in those days	I miss most of it as well, things were so faster. What were your favorite parts about the 90s?

When I was in middle school, I had a friend come over to ride horses with me. After riding my mother pressured me to get on a horse bareback I wasn't comfortable riding. She made such a big scene that I got on to make her stop.	wow that was brave of you.  Is she still riding?

Yes, the horse took off running and I got thrown into a metal fence. My mother then proceeded to yell and me and make fun of me for trusting her. She told me that I should never trust anyone not even my own parents, it was really embarrassing to get yelled at in from my friend. Afterwards my ribs hurt for 2 months.	That's really rough, did she eventually get to say something about how bad of an accident it was?

My friend really wanted me to go rollerblading with him, but I haven't been rollerblading since I was a little kid. I didn't want to roll into a car.	well that is a very adult decision to make. You should of just gone.
We went, but it was still pretty terrible because I felt completely uncomfortable and was bent over the whole time ready to catch myself.	Uh ohhh! Well maybe next time it will be better! Haha
My husband is on the road a lot, I hardley ever see him.	What road does he be on?
Yes, its hard but I try to remember he does it for our family! I have been trying to adapt to enjoying alone time.	i know what you mean i wish i could enjoy alone time too but we all have busy lives
I have an interview for a job that I don't feel qualified for	That can be nerve wrecking. What kind of job is it?
I will try. I'm a pretty anxious person in general so it's hard	Try to do some pushups or situps
I'm moving in a few months to a new state, I'm starting to feel nervous.	I think you'll do great! Are you moving for a job or house?
To my husband hometown so it'll be new for me but he is excited to be back near family.	Getting back to your hometown is the best.  Are you guys going for a vacation?
I saw a dog get hit by car today on the highway.	poor dog
It was pretty tramatic, I still see the dog getting hit in my head and the sound. No, I was on my way to work, I couldn't stop :(	Aw, poor dog, did you do anything to stop it?
I can't even begin to tell you how nervous I was about my first tattoo.	Oh really? How come it was so hard?

Definitely! I get lightheaded when I see my own blood, and my pain threshold was low at the time. It turned out great though, and now I have several!	oh wow, do you ever feel like you are getting lightheaded
I love my husband! He has been so sweet this week!	Aw, that's awesome! It's great when someone shows they care about you. I bet he appreciated that!
He knew I had a rough day today so he brought home my favourite wine and Taco Bell! It's the little things :)	Love taco bell, have you enjoyed it recently?
It's been a great week!	Glad to hear it, what's going on next?
I got a promotion at work that I wasn't expecting!	Congrats! What will you be doing at your new billet?

Music is a powerful thing. Sometimes it feels like it can transport you to another time and place. You know what I mean?	Oh yes I know what you mean. Sometimes music can transport you right to the next beat.

Who can deny it? My dad passed away 2 years ago. Sometimes I put on his old records and imagine what it would have been like to hang out with him in the 70s.	I am sorry for your loss.  I can also imagine being in his shoes.
I was feeling kind of down so I ended up snuggling with a stuffed rabbit I have. It brought back a lot of good old memories.	That is awesome I love stuffed animals

Awe yeah thanks. He's pretty soft even though he some derpy eye that point in opposite directions. Brings me a lot of comfort and reminds me that someone cares.	Aww, that's so sweet. I love animals and feel so lucky to have one! My cat's eyes always point in opposite directions though, they are always flipping through the pages lol
My dog got hit by a car.	sorry to hear that. did youanked his phone
He did not live. I've never felt so sad before.	Oh man! I am so sorry. What happened?
Some random guy was in my backyard, I didn't realize before I looked outside that I was missing pants.	Wow what did you do after?
Turns out he was the cable guy fixing a wire. Still mad he didn't ask permisson first.	That's annoying.  Why did he not ask first?
My family is still hasn't recovered from the untimely passing of my father two years ago.	Sorry to hear that, are they okay?

My siblings and I are managing, and have found some peace. My mother is a different story. It was just so sudden and unexpected.	Family comes first, and sometimes it is more urgent to do that than just manage. Why did she left?
I've got a week off from work. Time to sleep in and binge watch my favorite shows.	You deserve this week off!

I like It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia. I'm rewatching it for the third time	Oh me TOO! I love that show. I used to watch it with my dad when I was little. I can't believe it's still on and still brings back good memories.
I was really stressed out and grad school and had no choice but to drop out to keep my sanity.	What are you going to study?

That is what I was thinking at the time, but I've been having a really tough time finding a job where I can advance into a higher position. I always seem to get positions with no mobility.	Are you a teacher?
I tripped on some steps in front of a whole bunch of people on my way to class.	that stinks
It was pretty humiliating. I fell flat on my face.	Oh no. How did you manage to do that?
My boyfriend is sick. He can't eat much so I made some soup for him	That's thoughtful. soup is good for all
I made chicken noodle soup.	I love chicken soup. What's your favorite soup made with it?
I had a meeting last week where I gave a presentation over the wrong documentation and no one said anything until after the meeting.	Oh, wow! That is embarrassing!
After I figured out what I did, I sure was. Ate at my cube ever since I don't even want to make eye contact with anyone.	That sounds so delicious and relaxing.

I have a really big meeting next week. I have rehearsed what I am to go over all this past week and plan to practice a little more this weekend.	That's really great that you have this preparation in place. Hopefully all goes well.
It's a meeting presenting a new product to the board. Big stuff and big money for the company.	Sounds like a good job.  Are you nervous?
I caught my boyfriend texting his ex	ohh wow. Did you confront him about it?
It was definitely a bit flirty. I think he misses being with her	Does he ever stray from her?
I know I broke up with my ex, but I can't help but feel irritated when he talks about going on dates.	Why did you break up?

We actually get along really well and are much better friends than a couple. I guess I still just get a littler territorial, i think he does too.	I have had trouble with that too. Is there any reason why?
I can't wait to see my final grades. I think I got all A's this semester.	I bet you did great!
On Monday. I'm going to treat myself if I did well	Good for you. We need to treat ourselves every now and then. What are you doing to treat yourself?
I was very upset when I found my kitten today.	Awww!  I'm sorry to hear that!  What happened?
No, I had to put it down. It ate a poisonous plant. He should not have been outside.	Oh no! Are you ok? What is the plant?
I cried a bit, but kept it together for my little girl because she had let him out.	I enjoy visiting the nursing home on occasion.	That is nice, how come?
Not really, I take my daughter to see them, so many of them have no visitors at all.	Maybe you could invite some of them to visit?
She likes to bake, so we take them what she makes :)	Awww! that's sweet of her. What kind of cookies does she make?
She is pretty good for an eleven year old, better than I was.	That is good! How did you get her so good?

I had a secret and went to my mother to confide in her, as well as get off my chest. I know she would never betray my secret and can always count on her.	Sounds like a lovely surprise. How long have you two been friends?
Yes, I sure do! There aren't many people you can feel that way with and I am so grateful!	How do you reward yourself?

My son applied to a prestigious college and the wait killed us. I was anxious and nervous waiting to see if he was accepted!	I can understand how you would be anxious. That is great news though that he is getting into a college!
He did! He's in his 3rd year, going to be an Aerospace Engineer, so we are very proud of him.	Wow, that's amazing!  3rd years is a very long career.  Do you get to have kids?

My sister passed away several years ago. She took her life, and my mother and I found her right after she did it. This was very painful, traumatic and hard for us all.	I'm sorry. My sister had the same thing happen. She was sick for a couple weeks, but then recovered and was fine after a couple days.

It didn't really seem to sink in for my mother for awhile, she was in denial. But, it was so hard when it did. I went into a depression for awhile, as she was my only sibling and we were very close.	I can definitely relate, i was very close to my mom as well
When my son first started college, I felt so much love and affection, but it was definitely hard to see him go! I was very proud though.	College changes everyone. Some go way more places then others.

He went to the University of Alabama in Huntsville. It's focused on science, engineering, etc. He's going to be an Aerospace Engineer. It's great to see him go for his dreams!	Amazing! So Alabama is the Alabama of the north?
We went on vacation a few weeks ago and went to the beach, It was so relaxing and great. I really enjoyed the time with my family.	Oh I love the beach. What did you guys do on your vacation?
That's great! I'm sure you earned it, just like we do. It's so good to get some time away from the hustle and bustle of life!	I sure did. It felt so good to get away from that rotten world.
I am looking forward to next week! My husband has been out of town on business for several weeks and comes home next weekend!	Cool! Are you excited to get to spend some time together?
I am going to cook a special meal and see if he wants to go out, just us two. I know he will like that.	That sounds like so much fun!  What is the special meal?

My husband has been out of town a few weeks for work but is coming back next weekend. I have a surprise night planned for just us. I am optimistic and sure he will really enjoy it.	It's good to have someone you can trust, but make sure you let him know how you feel!
Thanks! We've been married almost 23 years but I try to keep things fun and spend time together.	It is so nice to have someone that always has your back.

My son went back to college recently and it had me feeling a bit nostalgic. I could just picture him starting Kindergarten and it seemed not so long ago!	I know the feeling. My daughter just went back to high school. It's a change, but a welcome one.
Yes, very. But, time sure has flown by with him growing up. I can just see his little blonde head when he was 5 and just starting school!	Well, you can't help it. I bet he is full of energy now.

I was promoted to a Team Leader and I felt very secure I could do well at the job. I had years of experience and was ready for a leadership role.	That's great! It's leadership - not necessarily skill - that makes the difference.
Yes, thank you! I had worked very hard through the years, and I felt that I earned it, and would do well at it.	What kind of work do you do?
There was an incident where one of my back neighbors called my young son a name and made fun of him. I was so mad, beyond angry!	wow! what happened after that?

Yes, and she had two children of her own, similar in age. Her son also weighed more than mine! She did it because my son rode his bike through the corner of her yard as rode around the circle, that made her mad! Can you believe that??	Oh I'm so sorry you had to experience that! That is infuriating to hear
Last week my granddaughter started school for the first time. I worried about her the entire day.	Oh that's exciting! I bet you were super excited! Is she starting any special classes?
It turns out she loves and and I was a mess for 8 hours for nothing.	Well thats a relief! How did you do?

I always try and plan everything in advance to bring everything we need when we go on vacation. We recently went on our honeymoon and I didn't do very well this time. Ugh!	That makes sense, planning ahead is much better than not being prepared!
I forgot everything. I guess I was so excited about the wedding, I totally failed at packing this time. Oh well, it was still fun.	Oh no! Did you forget your spouse's wedding anniversary, too?
One day I was visiting a friend and her boyfriend came up and kissed me, while I was waiting for my friend to return from another room! It was sneaky and repulsed me!	Wow! What did you do?

I didn't....only because of her situation. She had custody of her very ill and handicapped infant grandson, she wasn't working so depended on him financially and she was very much in love with him. She already suspected he was with other women, and stayed.....	That's sad, you should've done something, but you didn't.
The other night I was home alone and all of a sudden I heard someone knocking at the door really loud and they wouldn't stop. I was so scared.	Who was it?
No, I ignored them and they finally went away. I was just about to call the police before they left though. I hope that doesn't happen again.	If they are still there tomorrow, call the police.

I was trying to ignore the fact that my 50th birthday was coming up but my family decided to throw me a surprise party.	50th birthday is always awesome.  I would have wanted everyone to be happy and not care about the past.  Congrats on winning the family contest!
It was so much fun and such a happy night. I'm trying to embrace my age now and not ignore it any more	That is good, you should look at old pictures

A few weeks ago, my husband and I had a big argument. I said some pretty hurtful things, and wished I hadn't. I felt very bad and disappointed in myself afterwards.	Oh that's terrible. Are you guys still talking now?
Yes, that's true. I tend to be a bit more verbal on my end and say things I regret later.	I'm the same way. But if it's said during a heated argument, I tend to back up my words more closely.

One night when my kids and I came home, I saw a shadow in my hallway as I came in the back door. I was so scared and was afraid someone had broken in my home.	I would have been terrified too. Did you figure out what it was?
Yes, and I live out in the country so I wouldn't get a quick response time from emergency vehicles. But, luckily, it turned out to be my shadow!	What happened to your shadow?

There was a day that I was a bit short on cash on hand and I didn't give money to a homeless man. I usually always do, as I feel it's my part to help those in need, as I am blessed. I felt very bad that I didn't that day.	That is very considerate of you.
Well, homeless people aren't common in my area, so that's why I felt a bit bad about it.	I'm sorry to hear that. Are there any shelters in your area?
When my children were born, it was a rejoicing time for me. I can't think of a time I felt more happiness.	That must've been so exciting!
Yes, I have two children and I feel so blessed to have them. I lucked out and got a boy and girl, both healthy, smart and wonderful.	Congrats! Its nice to have a child that is healthy and well.

I used to work in a place where all my colleagues had different believes to myself. I wanted to stay true to what I believed in, so had to walk away from conversations on many occasions.	I can understand that. I believe that you should stay true to your values.

Just that all people should be given an equal chance in life and that no one type of person is better than another, just because of their religion or skin color, or where they come from.	I totally agree with you. If there's one thing theists do it's completely ignore the fact that there's a big difference between someone being motivated by race and someone motivated by sex -- and I'm no convert...but I do think there should be some recognition for both groups of people.

They believed that people of their religion where better than everyone else and were going to heaven, while the rest of us are left at the gate! That's one of their beliefs anyway. I don't agree with that, but chose to keep my mouth shut!	I recently bought a new car after not driving for several years and I was really scared to drive it, especially on the highway.	Oh, that sounds stressful. Glad to hear you're doing okay though!

Just a Honda Civic. People drive crazy around here. I don't want to have another car accident like the last one.	I had a car accident and I don't regret it one bit. You just got to live with it. Just keep your head up and it'll be okay.
I recently joined a group to help me lose weight. I have so much respect and admire everyone in that group so much.	Thats great! what kind of diet are you following?
It has really helped to have their support. I am so grateful for them	They sound like such good people!

A few years ago I applied for US citizenship. To succeed you have to pass a Civics test. I was so terribly nervous!	Good on you for getting a good education and taking the test!  I didn't know you could get a natural born US citizen.
I passed! Turns out you only had to answer three questions correctly. But they have 50 to choose from so you have to study the lot!	wow thats awesome!

Thank you. My poor husband had to sit every single night and test me. He's American and he didn't think he could pass!	I found some old Christmas cards the other day and had a lovely time reading them and reminiscing about the people who sent them.	That sounds wonderful!  Were they people you knew personally?
